alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 545 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jonathan Dickinson State Park, or near Tequesta, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Tequesta, North County Airport, The Acreage, Philo Farms, Fau North Campus, Jupiter Farms and Limestone Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
